nodes.bodyText: Can you add some log lines please that we're detaching the disk or fi we're not doing anything as it's already attached.
Detaching has the log in detachDiskFromVm() method, attaching in attachDiskToVm()
Can you add a logline that the disk already exists and we're not doing anything.
Can you change it to 60 please?
We should at least log if RESOURCE_CRN_PARAMETER is not set in the stack, that should never happen, right?
Not scope of PR, but detaching and attaching could be done parallel for multiple volumes if they are longish-running
Could you please raise a jira ticket about this improvement?
We should log all the generated resource names here.
The resourceName() method is extended with the logging.
minor typo: it has thrown --> it has been thrown
I would pass the cut length as param instead of always taking DATE_FORMAT.length
